# Summary

Over 3 years of experience in analyzing complex datasets, generating insightful reports, and providing actionable insights to improve business performance. Strong proficiency in using analytical tools such as R, SQL, and Excel to analyze and visualize data, identifying key business trends. Proven track record of collaborating with sales and marketing teams to optimize data-driven strategies and deliver innovative solutions for growth. Exceptional ability in data storytelling, translating findings into clear, impactful reports for key decision-makers.

# Experience



\cvevent{2023-2024}{Data Analyst}{Department of Sales and Marketing \newline Ashkan tejarat Aram}{I focused on analyzing sales trends, customer behavior, and market data to optimize strategies. My responsibilities included cleaning data, creating insightful reports, identifying growth opportunities, and providing data-driven recommendations to improve performance.}


\cvevent{2016~}{Founder and Editor in chief}{Engare.net (Online Magazine)}{(individual endeavor) Online wesite magazine in Social Science field (with over 30K social media followers)}


\cvevent{2016-2023}{University Breaks}{}{I stepped away from my old professional field due to university,Of Course only to discover an exciting new path ahead.}


\cvevent{2012 - 2016}{chief technology officer}{Bina co}{I oversaw the integration of hardware and software for surveillance and alarm systems and conducted market research to expand services and products.}


\cvevent{2010-2012}{Expert Technician}{Department of Network and Security \newline Bina co}{My expertise involved software and hardware tasks, as well as configuring network infrastructure and software systems.}
